Package io.micronaut.guides.core

Class SourceMacroSubstitution

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.SourceMacroSubstitution
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, MacroSubstitution
@Singleton public class SourceMacroSubstitution extends Object
SourceMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends SourceBlockMacroSubstitution. It provides the implementation for the "source" macro used in the guides.

  • Field Summary
